channel.title: I have a question/help about my client
channel.description: Hey guys, i am wondering. how do people make the client work when there are no .class files. i've seen the same source project as mine and they have just a 32 bit and 64 bit and a .jar and they all workk. when i took out my .class files, it doesnt work. what do you do please tellme :(

item.title: I have a question/help about my client
item.dc:creator: @Storm_Powner Storm Powner
item.description:
@Storm_Powner wrote:

lawl they just used jar maker, and just gave the rar and batch and that should work

Read full topic
item.source: I have a question/help about my client

item.title: I have a question/help about my client
item.dc:creator: @iiTzSkillz iiTzSkillz
item.description:
@iiTzSkillz wrote:

They “hide” the files so that people don’t mess with them

EDIT: If you want to know how to do it, Select the files then Right click and select Properties then Tick “Hidden”

Read full topic
item.source: I have a question/help about my client
